title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - A32nx - Control the door and use the camera
description:
In this short video we will have a look at the new Flypad which has been added to the cockpit for the co-pilot and look at a gadget in the cockpit: the camera to see who is in front of the door.

If you would like to give the addon a try yourself visit the site below to download it:
https://flybywiresim.com/
